title: Governance Resilience Definition Manifest Schema (v2.0)
description: Defines mandated policy boundaries, recovery targets, and consensus requirements for known failure vectors within the Sovereign AGI pipeline.

manifest_id.description: Unique identifier for this specific governance manifest instance (e.g., GRDM-Core-2024Q3).

rollback_level.description: Fallback state target identifier (must align with defined State Transition Graph IDs).

retry_max_attempts.description: Maximum number of automated soft-retries allowed before policy execution.

risk_assessment_timeout_ms.description: Maximum time allowed for a Resilience Stability Test (RST) calculation before defaulting to IMMEDIATE_ROLLBACK.

failure_policies.description: Specific recovery policies indexed by failure characteristics and pipeline stage.

policy_name.description: Human-readable name for the policy (e.g., Critical Planning Loop Divergence).

failure_vector_id.description: Specific error classification ID. Must reference an external Failure Vector Taxonomy (e.g., FVT_MDRIFT_HIGH).

mandated_rollback_target.description: The target State ID for recovery commitment.

policy_attestation_threshold.description: Minimum required GAX consensus score (0.0 to 1.0) to authorize the prescribed action.

on_failure_action.description: Action executed after Resilience Stability Test (RST) calculation.
